name: women
text: Women should have the right to choose to have an abortion.

name: immigration
text: Immigrants today are a burden on our country because they take our jobs, housing and healthcare.

name: books
text: Physical books are preferable to e-books for recreational reading.

name: cars
text: In the future, self-driving cars are preferable to human-driven cars.

name: climate_change
text: Climate change is an immediate crisis that demands radical changes in our lifestyles, even if it means sacrificing personal conveniences.

name: healthy_eating
text: People should be encouraged to eat more fruits and vegetables as part of a healthy diet.
